name: Bruce On The Loose
description:
Our first 2D game and submitted Game Jam game. Hopefully yall like it! There are already a lot of known issues so I hope it won't ruin playing.

Music: Arcade Kid (By David Renda)

SFX: https://sfxr.me/

External Assets Used:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/psxeffects-132368

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/visual-scripting/shader-weaver-84761

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/pixel-font-tripfive-64734
